title: LG 335 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Dazzle Steel, GL-T372JDS3)

product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Refrigrator Unit and 10 Years on Compressor from LG
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship

product_description.Inverter Linear Compressor: With precise internal temperature control, the Inverter Linear Compressor avoids temperature fluctuations and makes this LG frost-free refrigerator energy-efficient, as well as less noisy.
product_description.Linear Cooling: Linear Cooling monitors the temperatures across the various sections of the refrigerator and helps reduce the temperature gap thereby providing uniform cooling. This helps keep your food fresh for up to 14 days.

review:
First of all, very nicely designed product from LG, superb space, solid as well. Silently works. I am writing this review after using of 9 days.....
Only thing is that, after delivery, LG people came late for installation. Its overall very good refrigerator from LG.
GO GOR IT.... also it is so energy efficient....u can save your light bills.

Product quality is very good, its a premium quality refrigerator. Various features, especially I like the door cooling. Super fast cooling, back side is fully covered. Wheels are on the rear side that's why it's easily moveable. It is enough for a medium size family.

After placing the order Flipkart has delivered within 14 hours and LG has installed within 4 hours after delivery. That's amazing, I'm really happy. 😀😀

Thumps up 👍👍

Value for money nice product from LG but Quality of tray could be improved and inside plastic quality is degraded as compared to other refrigerator. Cooling is very good in every corner & door,very less noise,easy to convertible freezer tq Lg 🙏
Best deal in BBD. Thank you flipkart for this amazing deal. And ofcourse thanks LG to create this super model with all latest technologies.

Amazing LG brand good choice and great item Like this item delivery to fast thanks flipkart 🥰🥰🥰🥰 Today installation 01.08.2021 complete thanks to flipkart 🥰

I have been using this since last 2 days - overall pretty good performance so far !

Flipcart delivery is awesome; delivery staffs are very decent and infact installation completed by the very next day of Delivery

Decent design with plenty storage. But fridge door is making little sound while closing and it's too tight, top freezer door is smooth. Lg technician don't want to fix it rather in hurry to leave my place while installing. Other wise I could have given 5star.

I loved this product❤💞
That's very spacious fridge... Like I have put on many things inside then also it looks empty... Cooling power is fabulous..... And yes, Sometimes the door of the fridge by mistake can be leaft open... It will give you reminder beep... Which will define you that you haven't closed the door..... Well, newly bought..... So can't say much... But under 3 days everything went very awesome.... ❤❤❤❤❤❤...

Bought this in big billion day sale. Silent operation and good quality plastic used. LG has adapted well to indian market consumers and the climate and they make good tailored products for indian markets.

The vegetable tray is a bit small and should have been big. Also there should be a bulb in the freezer compartment.

Operation wise it is good and the door alarm is handy. Cooling is fine till now but actually will be tested during summers.

Bought this in big billion day sale. Silent operation and good quality plastic used. LG has adapted well to indian market consumers and the climate and they make good tailored products for indian markets.

The vegetable tray is a bit small and should have been big. Also there should be a bulb in the freezer compartment.

Operation wise it is good and the door alarm is handy. Cooling is fine till now but actually will be tested during summers.

Good refrigerator. Almost silent performance. Got a good deal during Big Billion Days sale event. However shelf placement needs to be checked. Can add up more space by ordering one additional shelf from service centre. Overall satisfactory purchase.

A very well built and quality product from LG. Cooling is uniform and quick. The vegetable tray and extra fruit tray keeps fruits and vegetables dry and crispy without dew or becoming soggy. Lots of big and usable bottle trays. Back is concealed for a good finish. Since LG manufactures their own compressors, expect the compressor to last long. The design is distinctively LG with nothing borrowed or shared with brands. I assume the smart diagnostics mobile app facility works but did not try. Freezer is large and spacious and does not look too big compared to the fridge zone. Ice box has a large bin and two ice maker trays with twist knobs. Cons: The glass shelves seem fragile though. And the temperature settings could have been kept outside rather than deep inside and the buttons look unfortunately cheap. Summary: Overall an excellent product from LG and well worth the price.

I have been using this machine for 1 month now.. dint like the look of the machine, dint like the aluminium tray like thing mounted on top of the machine, definitely not happy with the storage capacity, especially the veggies basket, which is too small... Samsung 345 L is huge and very spacious.. feeling like I made a mistake buying this model

Received the refrigerator (335 L) in 2 days. LG technician opened the box and installed the fridge, and also provided instructions on how to use. 335 L doesn't seem that big. Go for 360 L if your family has 4 or more members.
The fridge is somewhat energy efficient. Even with 3 stars for a 335 liter fridge, it consumes only 215 units per year. A 5 star 200 liter fridge would consume around 104 units per year. I chose this fridge cause of the inverter linear compressor and for the convertible mode.
